description: In June 2012, podcaster and vet web dev Ed Finkler spoke openly about his lifelong struggles with mental illness. 4 years later, a non-profit corporation with 3 dozen volunteers is working to change the tech and open source community. In this talk, Finkler tells the story of how the episode happened, the incredible response, and how it grew into a charity dedicated to changing an industry.
title: How We Changed The World With Open Source
